original_text: Then, in his vision, Balaam saw the Amalekites. He said, ‘Amalek was the most powerful of all the nations. God will destroy it now and for ever.’
korean_text: 또 아말렉을 바라보며 예언하여 이르기를 아말렉은 민족들의 으뜸이나 그의 종말은 멸망에 이르리로다 하고

sentences.original_text: Then, in his vision, Balaam saw the Amalekites.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 발람은 그의 환상에서 아말렉 사람들을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He said, 'Amalek was the most powerful
